source_text.raw_block:
Wlzud Lock (Alteration)
Range: Touch
Components: V, S
Duration: Permanent
Casting Time: 2
Area of Effect: 30 square feet/level
Saving Throw: None
A wizard lock spell cast upon a door,
hest, or portal magically locks it. The
aster can freely pass his own lock without
ffecting it; otherwise, the wizard-locked
or or object can be opened only by break-
the one casting the spell. Note
other planes cannot burst a wizard lock as
they can a held portal (see the hold portal
spell).
Third-Level Spells
